import React from 'react' import { MDBBtn, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBInput, MDBTextArea, MDBFile } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import Footer from '../NavFooter/Footer'; import Navbar from '../NavFooter/Navbar'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function JobApply() { return (<>

Apply for a job

Full name
Email address
Message
Upload CV
Upload your CV/Resume or any other relevant file. Max file size 50 MB
) }
